entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
